title: Theresa May – 2018 Speech in Macedonia
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, in Macedonia on 17 May 2018.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)

I know that both Macedonia and Greece are working closely to find a solution and this requires political courage and a willingness to make difficult decisions. Resolution will bring clear benefits to both countries and also to the region as a whole. And you can rely on the UK’s full support in this.
